original: Larsson, Erik Allan, landsfiskal, Karlskrona, f. 3/6/06 i Asarum, Blek. 1., av Johan o. Hilda L. G. 42 m. Walborg Körner. Barn: Birgitta f. 43. — Landsfiskalsex. 30. E. landsfiskal i Jämshögs distr. 34-37, dito i Ronneby distr. 37-41, landsfiskalsas-sist. där 41-45, landsfiskal i Tvings distr. sed. 46, tf. dito i Nättraby distr. sed. s. å. Ordf. i flera tax:ndr inom Blek. län sed. 40.
translated: Larsson, Erik Allan, district fiscal officer, Karlskrona, b. 3/6/06 in Asarum, Blekinge County, son of Johan and Hilda L. G. Larsson, married to Walborg Körner in 1942. Children: Birgitta, b. 1943. - District fiscal officer since 1930. E. served as district fiscal officer in Jämshög district from 1934 to 1937, in Ronneby district from 1937 to 1941, as district fiscal officer in the same place from 1941 to 1945, district fiscal officer in Tvings district since 1946, and acting district fiscal officer in Nättraby district since the same year. Chairman of several tax boards within Blekinge County since 1940.
